backend/main.mo: Defines user task types, daily content, profiles, and admin authorization logic with bootstrap admin creation and role management.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides concise summaries of numerous frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes with authentication guards and wraps the app in theming and layout providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: Admin access denial UI with bootstrap-admin flow, principal copy helper, and promote-to-admin mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyC: Displays daily Islamic content in an auto-rotating carousel with loading, empty, and error states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyO: Shows a grid of daily task tiles summarizing completion status for prayers, fasting, tilawah, and other activities.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyP: Renders a progress bar summarizing daily task completion percentage and counts, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DateSe: Provides a button-triggered popover calendar for selecting and updating the current date.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Monthl: Draws an SVG line chart visualizing daily completion percentages for a given month.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Prayer: Displays prayer times with timezone selection, loading skeletons, and error handling for fetching times.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Yester: Shows tilawah, tahfidz, and murojaah progress for the previous day with loading placeholders.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Renders the app footer with copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the authenticated user's header with theme toggle, navigation menu, and logout handling.
Provides the main layout wrapper including header, routed content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/reports/Download: Lets users select a date range and export tasks as CSV or PDF by fetching data and generating a downloadable file.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Manages app theme state with system detection, persistence, and context access via useTheme.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Fasting: Displays and updates fasting status and notes for a selected date using backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Murojaa: Allows users to input and save Murojaah surah and verse ranges with validation and backend updates.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Sedekah: Handles Sedekah completion tracking and opens a configured donation link while updating backend state.
frontend/src/components/tracking/SholatM: Tracks daily prayer completion via toggles and syncs changes to the backend task record.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Tahfidz: React component for viewing and updating daily Tahfidz tasks, including surah and verse range validation and saving via backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/tracking/Tilawah: React component for editing and saving Tilawah tasks with surah and verse inputs, using backend queries and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Authentication hook exposing identity state, login/logout, role checks, and admin status resolution using backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, admin status, and daily task data through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login flow, identity storage, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrayerTimes.ts: Hook that calculates daily prayer times based on a selected timezone, with local storage persistence and auto-refresh at midnight.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling with light/dark theme variables and utility definitions for the appâ€™s visual design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGatePage.t: Protects admin routes by verifying authentication and admin status, handling loading, errors, redirects, and access denial.
Admin dashboard with tabbed sections for user management, daily content, statistics, and application settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DailyContentTab: CRUD interface for daily Quran reflection, hadith, and motivational content, with form editing and previews.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SettingsTab.tsx: Allows admins to view and update the global sedekah payment link with validation and save feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StatisticsTab.t: Renders admin statistics UI with date inputs and placeholder participation metrics, showing total users and progress bars.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserManagementT: Provides admin UI for listing users and creating new accounts via dialog, using backend hooks and principal validation.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page showing greeting, date selector, daily content, prayer times, progress, and worship tracking modules, with a profile setup dialog for new users.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using useAuth to trigger authentication and redirect users to either a saved return path or the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/MonthlyProgressPage.t: Displays monthly task progress with navigation between months, charts, statistics, and CSV download support based on task data.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Generates a CSV export from task data by mapping fields and escaping values.
frontend/src/utils/date.ts: Utility functions for timestamp conversion, formatting dates, and navigating days.
frontend/src/utils/month.ts: Provides helpers for month boundaries, labels, day counts, and list of days.
frontend/src/utils/pdf.ts: Builds a simple text-based PDF blob summarizing task details for a date range.
frontend/src/utils/prayerTimes.ts: Calculates Indonesian prayer times using solar position formulas and timezone presets.
frontend/src/utils/progress.ts: Computes task completion percentage and counts based on six worship-related criteria.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL hash.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates surah and verse range inputs, ensuring required fields and correct numeric ordering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and importing typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, architecture, known issues, and implemented features for the Ramadhan Tracker app.
